directions: Combine water, oil and salt in medium saucepan; bring to boil. Combine couscous, apricots and spices in large bowl. Add boiling liquid. Cover immediately; let stand until water is absorbed, about 5 minutes. Uncover; fluff with fork. Cool. (Can be made 6 hours ahead. Cover; chill. Bring to room temperature before continuing.)
Mix nuts, green onions and basil into couscous. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups (about 7 ounces) dried apricots, thinly sliced
1 1/4 cups (about 4 ounces) unsalted pistachios, toasted, chopped
title: Couscous with Dried Apricots and Pistachios
